personal.name: Agrim Sigdel
personal.tagline: Full-Stack Developer | AI Enthusiast | Creative Problem Solver
personal.summary: Versatile Full-Stack Developer with a strong foundation in modern AI, specializing in React/TypeScript and Python. I bridge the gap between complex AI models and user-centric applications, delivering production-ready code for Computer Vision and NLP domains.
personal.shortSummary: Full-Stack Developer focused on AI Innovation and building production-ready code with React, TypeScript, and Python.

education.degree: BSc. Computer Science and Information Technology (CSIT)

description: Led creative direction and brand guidelines for 625+ attendees
Managed cross-functional teams for visual and marketing materials
Built modern web applications with React/TypeScript
Implemented Computer Vision and NLP solutions

projects.title: ANPR System
projects.description: Highly optimized YOLOv8 backend with a modern React/TypeScript frontend for Nepali plate recognition.
projects.outcome: 30 FPS live processing with custom Devanagari recognition logic.

projects.title: Parking Management
projects.description: End-to-end automatic parking system utilizing custom ANPR for real-time verification and access control.
projects.outcome: Automated gate entry/exit reducing manual verification significantly.

projects.title: Reddit Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Deep NLP pipeline using fine-tuned BERT for nuanced emotion classification on large-scale Reddit data.
projects.outcome: Practiced advanced prompt engineering and LLM-based interfaces.

projects.title: Styles
projects.description: A modern, responsive website built with PHP and html .
projects.outcome: Responsive design with optimized performance and accessibility.
